effects.display_string: Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.
Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 366 Versatility for 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.
Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

(2) Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activateLuck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec afterLuck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful melee abilities have a chance to Gnash your target dealing 74,024 Physical damage. Every third Gnash on the same target does additional damage based on targets missing health. Count is reset if Gnash hits a different target.

Use: Inject an enemy with digestive venom, dealing 670,095 Nature damage over 20 sec. While active, your attacks and abilities against the target restore 34,901 health. Cannot occur more than every 1 sec. 

Overhealing from this effect permanently increases your maximum health by the same amount, becoming an absorb shield upon leaving combat. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name_description.display_string: The War Within Season 1 Raid Finder

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,296 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
